text: Badger Girl was a ten-part educational BBC Look and Read production, which was first aired on BBC Two in 1984. ==Plot== Three children are on holiday on a farm in Dartmoor. They discover two crooks who are pony-rustling, and are determined to stop them. ==Episodes== # Stripey the Super Badger # Panic on the Lake # Finding the Ponies # Mick's Map # The Secret Passage # Lost on the Moor # The Badgerman # Running Away # Stripey the Badger # Sounds in the Night ==References== Category:BBC Television
title: Badger Girl
